#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int i,j,k;
    char ch;
    ch=getchar();
    while(1)
    {
        vector<char> s;
        int len=0;
        while((ch>'z'||ch<'a')&&ch!='E')
        {
            ch=getchar();
        }
        while((ch>='a'&&ch<='z')||ch=='E')
        {
            len++;
            s.push_back(ch);
            ch=getchar();
        }
        if(s[0]=='E') break;
        int Match[len];
        Match[0]=-1;
        for(i=1;i<len;i++)
        {
            j=i-1;
            while(j!=-1)
            {
                j=Match[j];
                if(s[j+1]==s[i])
                {
                    j++;
                    break;
                }
            }
            Match[i]=j;
        }
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if(i!=len-1)
            {
                printf("%d ",Match[i]+1);
            }
            else
            {
                printf("%d\n",Match[i]+1);
            }
        }
    }
}
